short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to allow you to test share your screen while presenting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remote Presenter by Brandlive allows Brandlive Producer users to capture the camera or screen of presenters in a remote location into the Producer app.
